caption: – Your cards is not stable. The element is floating. And can be any when you draw it. You'll have a chance to acquire or change cards during the game.  (Of cource not in jam version of the game, deckbuilding for another time. Just an idea for now.)

responces.caption: – OMG! I can't wait for the release. I'll buy a copy on steam, switch, mobile and any other platform available! Where i can preorder limited edition for $100 of become a patron?

caption: – Win me in battle and i teach you more spells.
